column4: hi all stupid question :p. I just installed nxserver on ubuntu connected nicely to a remote computer in full screen mode, How do I leave it?? :S thanks
do a menu appear when you put the mouse on the top? or maybe Ctrl+Alt does somethin... (just guessing :))
No no luck there :( It is like a am sitting at the remote computer (which is good!) but not in this case :P
haha if you are in linux just do <ctrl><alt>Backspace to kill the X Server, and then login again and search google or the documentation :)
